description: '''Masala Coffee''' is an Indian music band founded in 2014. The band performs across various genres - Indian folk, blues, pop and rock. Although they primarily compose original music and covers in Malayalam, the band also performs in Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Punjabi and English. Masala Coffee has also made a name for itself through the music they've composed and performed for movies including [[Solo (2017 film)|''Solo'']], ''[[Uriyadi]]'', ''[[Mundina Nildana]]'' and ''[[Kannum Kannum Kollaiyadithaal]].''
